title: How much vitamin C is in a drop of lemon essential oil?
description: Answer (1 of 6): Very obvious non, zero, zilch. why? I can guess it without knowing which trademark of oil you're talking about, because nobody would put vit C in such a product. It won't go in it. vitamine C aka L+ascorbic acid is water solube not oil solube, so if you try you would not get iy...
